title: Fliper50
author: Fliper50
content: Hello everyone.I'm looking for an Android developer, to create for me some tiny tools such as File Manager, Lock Screen, and more.If you have experience please share your telegram.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: Fliper50 on February 18, 2023, 04:53:43 PMHello everyone.I'm looking for an Android developer, to create for me some tiny tools such as File Manager, Lock Screen, and more.If you have experience please share your telegram.I think that there are not many Android developers here in the forum, I was not able after searching to find their announcement threads so that you can hire an Android designer through the Freelance sites, but you have to choose the best Android developer who has the most positive rating on these sites and who has good experience in the language Java Programming and Android SDK, Which also fits your budget to pay him within the hour.If you are new to freelance sites and want to be directed, you can check out the "Help & FAQ" page on these sites before you start hiring developers, And don't forget to do your research.[1] https://www.upwork.com/hire/android-developers/[2] https://www.toptal.com/android[3] https://www.guru.com/m/find/freelance-jobs/android-app-development/

comments.author: ani4444
comments.body: Hi,I am interested in developing android apps, please share details.Regards
